titleStmt.title: The Petition of knights, ivstices of peace, ministers, gentlemen, free-holders, and others, inhabitants of the county of Salop, to the number of 10000. Presented to the Commons House of Parliament upon Munday the 7. of March 1641.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
